languages.text: {n}Сложно ожидать, что сервиторизированное животное оценит ваш ласковый жест... и все же, когда вы нежно касаетесь оперения, {petname} склоняет набок одну из голов, словно ластясь в ответ.{/n}

{n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сложно ожидать, что сервиторизированное животное оценит ваш ласковый жест... и все же, когда вы нежно касаетесь оперения, {petname} склоняет набок одну из голов, словно ластясь в ответ.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently touch the feathers, one of {petname}'s heads tilts to one side, as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

{n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently touch the feathers, one of {petname}'s heads tilts to one side, as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

{n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

{n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

{n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

{n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴィター化された動物が愛情を感じるなどとは本来考えられない。しかし、あなたが優しく{petname}の羽を撫でると、頭のひとつがあなたの手に寄り添うように傾いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィター化された動物が愛情を感じるなどとは本来考えられない。しかし、あなたが優しく{petname}の羽を撫でると、頭のひとつがあなたの手に寄り添うように傾いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zu erwarten, dass ein Servitor-Tier deine emotionale Geste zu schätzen weiß, wäre dumm, doch als du die Federn von {petname} sanft streichelst, neigt einer der Köpfe sich zur Seite, in Richtung deiner Berührung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zu erwarten, dass ein Servitor-Tier deine emotionale Geste zu schätzen weiß, wäre dumm, doch als du die Federn von {petname} sanft streichelst, neigt einer der Köpfe sich zur Seite, in Richtung deiner Berührung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il serait absurde d'attendre un quelconque signe d'affection de la part d'une créature servitorisée... Et pourtant, tandis que vous effleurez le plumage de {petname}, vous sentez une de ses têtes se pencher pour recevoir votre caresse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il serait absurde d'attendre un quelconque signe d'affection de la part d'une créature servitorisée... Et pourtant, tandis que vous effleurez le plumage de {petname}, vous sentez une de ses têtes se pencher pour recevoir votre caresse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esperar que un animal servidorizado sepa apreciar tu gesto de afecto es un disparate; y sin embargo, cuando acaricias el plumaje de {petname}, una de sus cabezas se ladea como si intentase frotarse contra tu mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esperar que un animal servidorizado sepa apreciar tu gesto de afecto es un disparate; y sin embargo, cuando acaricias el plumaje de {petname}, una de sus cabezas se ladea como si intentase frotarse contra tu mano.{/n}

languages.text: {n}期待被改造成机器的动物理解你的感情，这恐怕不是什么明智之举。但即便如此，当你轻轻抚摸着{petname}的羽毛时，它的其中一个头颅靠了过来，似乎想离你的手更近一些。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}期待被改造成机器的动物理解你的感情，这恐怕不是什么明智之举。但即便如此，当你轻轻抚摸着{petname}的羽毛时，它的其中一个头颅靠了过来，似乎想离你的手更近一些。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörleştirilen bir hayvanın kendini sevdirmesini düşünmek bile ahmakçadır, buna rağmen nazikçe tüylerine dokunduğunda başlardan biri sana sokulurcasına eğiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Expecting a servitorised animal to appreciate your affectionate gesture would be folly, and yet, as you gently brush {petname}'s feathers, one of the heads tilts to one side as if leaning into your touch.{/n}
